message: Let's split it evenly, no need to overcomplicate things!
You're not getting the better deal, I'm the one taking the risk here!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
You're getting desperate, I'm taking control now!
I'm not going down without a fight! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting away with this easily!
You're running out of time, and I'm running out of patience!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to let you take everything!
You're getting close to losing everything, don't say I didn't warn you!
I'm not going down without a fight! I'll give you a small share, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're running out of time, and I'm not getting any younger!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll give you a tiny share, but I'm not going to let you take everything!
It's now or never, Alice. Take it or leave it!
